title: Fighting for the Demon King
description: I’ll fight Lucifer for her, even if it means risking everything…I’ve made Natasha, the fierce and beautiful demon hunter, mine. She’s more powerful than I anticipated, but even her powers may not be strong enough to help me win the war for my crown.Now Lucifer has unleashed an army of crazed demons in their true form to terrorize humans and fight against us. As the attacks escalate, cities are becoming plagued by demons running rampant and the entire demon realm is at risk of being exposed.Natasha is determined to fight the battle by my side, and while Lucifer may fear her strength, he also knows that she's my biggest weakness.But there is no going back now. This war must end—and I'll do whatever it takes to make sure we make it out alive...
author: Lindsey Devin
